About

My name is Eli and I’m data scientist at Stitch Fix, leading Data Labs. We’re working on novel challenges with an amazing team. If you’re interested in what we do, check out Stitch Fix’s technology page.

I wrote a book on SciPy and NumPy. It covers the barebones of the two Python packages, which are often used for numerical analysis.

Previously, I was an astrophysicist and researched how stars formed at some great places like Harvard, Smithsonian, ESO, Exeter, and CSIRO.

Crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine).
